Content:
You can change the `displayName` easily on your own

With the `stringtable.csv` file it'll look like this:
```
"LANGUAGE","English","Russian",
"STR_MyMod_XMutantName","X Mutant","X –ú—É—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç",
...
```

Then in `config.cpp` it'll be similar to this:
```
class mutant_base;
class x_mutant: mutant_base
{
  displayName = $STR_MyMod_XMutantName;
}
```

And not forget to add a `requiredAddons` for changes to take effect
